Module.Content:
<style type="text/css">
                html
				{
                    width: __UP_rdW__px;
                    height: __UP_rdH__px;
                }
				body, app-root
				{
					background: transparent;
					width: __UP_rdW__px;
					height: __UP_rdH__px;
					overflow: hidden;
					background-color: #__UP_BackColor__;
				}
            </style>
				
			<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/css/bootstrap.css" />
			<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/css/react-select.css" />
			<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-zoom-app/styles.152f858a7469b6b4f6fc.css">
            <body>
				<!-- import ZoomMtg dependencies -->
				<script src="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/lib/vendor/react.min.js"></script>
				<script src="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/lib/vendor/react-dom.min.js"></script>
				<script src="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/lib/vendor/redux.min.js"></script>
				<script src="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/lib/vendor/redux-thunk.min.js"></script>
				<script src="https://source.zoom.us/1.9.9/lib/vendor/lodash.min.js"></script>

				<!-- import ZoomMtg -->
				<script src="https://source.zoom.us/zoom-meeting-1.9.9.min.js"></script>
  
            	<app-root></app-root>
		
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-zoom-app/runtime-es2015.77fcd9cc57f99d316544.js" type="module"></script>

				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-zoom-app/polyfills-es2015.929ddb2176f23f83509f.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-zoom-app/main-es2015.0cadd1729a73925dc372.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-zoom-app/main-es5.0cadd1729a73925dc372.js" nomodule defer></script>

				<script type="text/javascript">

					var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();	
					
					function load() {
					
					}
  
					gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(load);
					
				</script>
			</body>
